text:
@piersmorgan @BorisJohnson Are we taking bets on how Johnson (please stop calling him "Boris," everyone, it tends to anthropomorphise him.) will avoid PMQs this week?  
Sudden 24-hour COVID-19 relapse?
An urgent desire to take immediate paternity leave?
Accidentally locked in a fridge?
I wonder.
